Essentials Enable Melpa use-package Recent files Writing text Focused writing Visual-line-mode Spell check Org mode Asthetics Org agenda Knowledge mangmet snippet Introduction In late 2023 two things happened that made me push this project forward. One, I declared config bankruptcy and started to rewrite my config from scratch and, two, the guilt of renewing this domain for another year kicked in. This site is a extension of a paper written in 2022 which I hope will work as a minimal viable config for people wanting to start out using this tool within their workflows.
